front.title: Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior. May target a character, creature or vehicle using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value.
front.lore: BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Standard issue for Imperial forces. So numerous that many have been stolen by Rebels. Extendable stock. Carries energy for 100 shots.
